cells.data:
# Install SQLite3 drivers.
go get github.com/mattn/go-sqlite3

# Install gin live restarter
go get github.com/codegangsta/gin
gin run main.go

# Install the ENV-aware arg-parsing replacement
go get github.com/namsral/flag

# Install vim go setup
git clone https://github.com/fatih/vim-go.git ~/.vim/bundle/vim-go
vi main.go
:GoInstallBinaries

# Install sqlboiler instead of GORM
# No, wait! It doesn't yet support SQLite.
go get -u -t github.com/volatiletech/sqlboiler

# Grab the mysql 5.7 image.
docker pull mysql:5.7

# Start the mysqld container and connect a client.
docker run --name catch-up-mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=hunter2 -d mysql:5.7
docker run -it --link catch-up-mysql:mysql --rm mysql:5.7 \
    sh -c 'exec mysql -h"$MYSQL_PORT_3306_TCP_ADDR" -P"$MYSQL_PORT_3306_TCP_PORT" -uroot -p"$MYSQL_ENV_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD"'
